Title: The Fugitive
Writer: Jeb Stuart (screenplay), David Twohy (screenplay), David Twohy (story), Roy Huggins (characters)
Actors: Harrison Ford, Tommy Lee Jones, Sela Ward, Julianne Moore
Plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.
